It's a pretty fun game, just bear in mind that if you're not a sharpshooter, don't play competitive, the salt concentration from players in competitive laughs at the amount of salt there is in the Dead Sea. Personally if I had actual friends that played it with me it would be a lot of fun, but now it's just something I play on the very rare occasion out of pure boredom.
